author: ppaul

review: Very quick and easy to set up and use!!
author: MM 44888

review: It's been so nice to have almost everything I need on my tv without fighting with something else.I use it primarily to watch Netflix and Hulu, but I love being able to search and see all of the options on Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime.That being said, there are a few things I would change.First, I would add a web browser option. That's my #1 wish. Add a browser so I can watch my school lectures on my tv.Second, update the mobile app. It's just not much use. Add more visual options so I can literally control it. I already have a basic remote. Give me more with the app.Third, the major unlikely part of my wishlist is screen mirroring from my other devices. Specifically from my phone, tablet, and laptop.Other than that, I love this thing! I use it literally daily.
author: M. S. Player "AlecPlaya"
